jasperReport.name: Formato8_1
jasperReport.queryString:
SELECT --tÃ­tulo de reporte distinct inv.fact_id as correlativo, c.name, p.name as periodo, (SELECT CASE WHEN $P{AD_Org_ID}=0 THEN ci.taxid ELSE oi.taxid END FROM ad_orginfo oi JOIN ad_clientinfo ci on ci.ad_client_id = oi.ad_client_id WHERE ci.ad_client_id = $P{AD_Client_ID} LIMIT 1) as ruc, (SELECT CASE WHEN $P{AD_Org_ID}=0 THEN c.description ELSE o.description END FROM ad_org o JOIN ad_client c on c.ad_client_id = o.ad_client_id WHERE c.ad_client_id = $P{AD_Client_ID} LIMIT 1) as cliente, acc.name as esquema,
--detalle de reporte inv.fact_id as correlativo, inv.dateinvoiced as fecha, CASE WHEN pyt.netdays = 0 THEN null ELSE (inv.dateinvoiced + pyt.netdays) END as fechavencimiento,
--comprobante de pago dt.codsunat as tipo, inv.serial as serie, inv.documentno as numero, dt.printname as nombre_tipo,
--informacion del cliente (SELECT reftrl.description FROM xendra.ad_ref_list_trl reftrl JOIN xendra.ad_ref_list refl on reftrl.ad_ref_list_id = refl.ad_ref_list_id JOIN xendra.ad_reference ree on refl.ad_reference_id = ree.ad_reference_id WHERE ree.name = 'C_BPartner DocType' AND bp.c_bp_doctypei = refl.value ) as tipo_doci,
bp.taxid as numero_doci, bp.name as nombre_socio,
-- detalle montos COALESCE (CASE WHEN dt.docbasetype = 'APC' THEN currencyConvert(gettaxbaseamtbyinvoice('IGV',inv.c_invoice_id) ,inv.C_Currency_ID,308,inv.dateinvoiced, inv.c_conversiontype_id,inv.AD_Client_ID, inv.AD_Org_ID)*-1 ELSE currencyConvert(gettaxbaseamtbyinvoice('IGV',inv.c_invoice_id) ,inv.C_Currency_ID,308,inv.dateinvoiced, inv.c_conversiontype_id,inv.AD_Client_ID, inv.AD_Org_ID)END,0) + COALESCE (currencyConvert(gettaxbaseamtbyinvoice('DUA',inv.c_invoice_id) ,inv.C_Currency_ID,308,inv.dateinvoiced, inv.c_conversiontype_id,inv.AD_Client_ID, inv.AD_Org_ID)/0.19,0) as base,
COALESCE (CASE WHEN dt.docbasetype = 'APC' THEN currencyConvert(gettaxamtbyinvoice('IGV',inv.c_invoice_id) ,inv.C_Currency_ID,308,inv.dateinvoiced, inv.c_conversiontype_id,inv.AD_Client_ID, inv.AD_Org_ID)*-1 ELSE currencyConvert(gettaxamtbyinvoice('IGV',inv.c_invoice_id) ,inv.C_Currency_ID,308,inv.dateinvoiced, inv.c_conversiontype_id,inv.AD_Client_ID, inv.AD_Org_ID)END,0) + COALESCE (currencyConvert(gettaxbaseamtbyinvoice('DUA',inv.c_invoice_id) ,inv.C_Currency_ID,308,inv.dateinvoiced, inv.c_conversiontype_id,inv.AD_Client_ID, inv.AD_Org_ID),0) as igv,
CASE WHEN dt.docbasetype = 'APC' THEN currencyConvert(gettaxbaseamtbyinvoice('IG2',inv.c_invoice_id) ,inv.C_Currency_ID,308,inv.dateinvoiced, inv.c_conversiontype_id,inv.AD_Client_ID, inv.AD_Org_ID)*-1 ELSE currencyConvert(gettaxbaseamtbyinvoice('IG2',inv.c_invoice_id) ,inv.C_Currency_ID,308,inv.dateinvoiced, inv.c_conversiontype_id,inv.AD_Client_ID, inv.AD_Org_ID)END as base_gravnograv,
CASE WHEN dt.docbasetype = 'APC' THEN currencyConvert(gettaxamtbyinvoice('IG2',inv.c_invoice_id) ,inv.C_Currency_ID,308,inv.dateinvoiced, inv.c_conversiontype_id,inv.AD_Client_ID, inv.AD_Org_ID)*-1 ELSE currencyConvert(gettaxamtbyinvoice('IG2',inv.c_invoice_id) ,inv.C_Currency_ID,308,inv.dateinvoiced, inv.c_conversiontype_id,inv.AD_Client_ID, inv.AD_Org_ID)END as igv_gravnograv,
CASE WHEN dt.docbasetype = 'APC' THEN currencyConvert(gettaxbaseamtbyinvoice('IG3',inv.c_invoice_id) ,inv.C_Currency_ID,308,inv.dateinvoiced, inv.c_conversiontype_id,inv.AD_Client_ID, inv.AD_Org_ID)*-1 ELSE currencyConvert(gettaxbaseamtbyinvoice('IG3',inv.c_invoice_id) ,inv.C_Currency_ID,308,inv.dateinvoiced, inv.c_conversiontype_id,inv.AD_Client_ID, inv.AD_Org_ID)END as base_nograv,
CASE WHEN dt.docbasetype = 'APC' THEN currencyConvert(gettaxamtbyinvoice('IG3',inv.c_invoice_id) ,inv.C_Currency_ID,308,inv.dateinvoiced, inv.c_conversiontype_id,inv.AD_Client_ID, inv.AD_Org_ID)*-1 ELSE currencyConvert(gettaxamtbyinvoice('IG3',inv.c_invoice_id) ,inv.C_Currency_ID,308,inv.dateinvoiced, inv.c_conversiontype_id,inv.AD_Client_ID, inv.AD_Org_ID)END as igv_nograv,
CASE WHEN dt.docbasetype = 'APC' THEN currencyConvert(gettaxbaseamtbyinvoice('NGR',inv.c_invoice_id) ,inv.C_Currency_ID,308,inv.dateinvoiced, inv.c_conversiontype_id,inv.AD_Client_ID, inv.AD_Org_ID)*-1 ELSE currencyConvert(gettaxbaseamtbyinvoice('NGR',inv.c_invoice_id) ,inv.C_Currency_ID,308,inv.dateinvoiced, inv.c_conversiontype_id,inv.AD_Client_ID, inv.AD_Org_ID)END as no_gravada,
CASE WHEN dt.docbasetype = 'APC' THEN currencyConvert(gettaxamtbyinvoice('ISC',inv.c_invoice_id) ,inv.C_Currency_ID,308,inv.dateinvoiced, inv.c_conversiontype_id,inv.AD_Client_ID, inv.AD_Org_ID)*-1 ELSE currencyConvert(gettaxamtbyinvoice('ISC',inv.c_invoice_id) ,inv.C_Currency_ID,308,inv.dateinvoiced, inv.c_conversiontype_id,inv.AD_Client_ID, inv.AD_Org_ID)END as isc,
CASE WHEN dt.docbasetype = 'APC' THEN currencyConvert(gettaxamtbyinvoice('OTR',inv.c_invoice_id) ,inv.C_Currency_ID,308,inv.dateinvoiced, inv.c_conversiontype_id,inv.AD_Client_ID, inv.AD_Org_ID)*-1 ELSE currencyConvert(gettaxamtbyinvoice('OTR',inv.c_invoice_id) ,inv.C_Currency_ID,308,inv.dateinvoiced, inv.c_conversiontype_id,inv.AD_Client_ID, inv.AD_Org_ID)END as otr_tributo,
CASE WHEN inv.c_currency_id<> (SELECT acc.c_currency_id FROM xendra.c_acctschema acc WHERE acc.c_acctschema_id = 1000026) THEN (CASE WHEN dt.docbasetype = 'APC' THEN inv.grandtotal*crt.multiplyrate*-1 ELSE inv.grandtotal*crt.multiplyrate END) ELSE (CASE WHEN dt.docbasetype = 'APC' THEN inv.grandtotal*-1 ELSE inv.grandtotal END) END as total,
crt.multiplyrate as tipo_cambio,
--detraccion (SELECT py.checkno FROM c_payment py JOIN c_bankaccount bka ON bka.c_bankaccount_id = py.c_bankaccount_id WHERE bka.bankaccounttype = 'D') as numero_detra, (SELECT py.datetrx FROM c_payment py JOIN c_bankaccount bka ON bka.c_bankaccount_id = py.c_bankaccount_id WHERE bka.bankaccounttype = 'D') as fecha_detra,
--referencia inv2.dateinvoiced as fecharef, dt2.codsunat as tiporef, inv2.serial as serieref, inv2.documentno as documentref
FROM c_invoice inv JOIN ad_client c on inv.ad_client_id = c.ad_client_id JOIN ad_org o on inv.ad_org_id = o.ad_org_id JOIN ad_orginfo oi on o.ad_org_id = oi.ad_org_id JOIN c_doctype dt on inv.c_doctype_id = dt.c_doctype_id JOIN gl_category gl on gl.gl_category_id = dt.gl_category_id JOIN c_bpartner bp on inv.c_bpartner_id = bp.c_bpartner_id JOIN c_paymentterm pyt on inv.c_paymentterm_id = pyt.c_paymentterm_id JOIN c_invoicetax tax on inv.c_invoice_id = tax.c_invoice_id JOIN c_tax tx on tx.c_tax_id = tax.c_tax_id JOIN c_conversiontype ctp on inv.c_conversiontype_id = ctp.c_conversiontype_id LEFT JOIN c_conversion_rate crt on (inv.dateinvoiced = crt.validto) and(inv.c_currency_id = crt.c_currency_id) and(inv.c_conversiontype_id = crt.c_conversiontype_id) and(inv.c_currency_id <> (SELECT acc.c_currency_id FROM c_acctschema acc WHERE acc.c_acctschema_id = $P{C_AcctSchema_ID})) JOIN fact_acct f on inv.c_invoice_id = f.record_id JOIN c_period p on f.c_period_id = p.c_period_id JOIN c_acctschema acc on f.c_acctschema_id = acc.c_acctschema_id LEFT JOIN c_allocationline allo on inv.c_invoice_id = allo.c_invoice_id LEFT JOIN c_payment py on allo.c_payment_id = py.c_payment_id LEFT JOIN c_invoice inv2 on inv.ref_invoice_id = inv2.c_invoice_id LEFT JOIN c_doctype dt2 on inv2.c_doctype_id = dt2.c_doctype_id
WHERE inv.issotrx = 'N' AND f.ad_table_id = '318' AND gl.codsunat = '08' AND f.c_acctschema_id = $P{C_AcctSchema_ID} AND f.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID} AND inv.ad_client_id = $P{AD_Client_ID} AND (CASE WHEN COALESCE($P{AD_Org_ID}, 0) = 0 THEN true ELSE inv.ad_org_id = $P{AD_Org_ID} END)
ORDER BY dt.codsunat, inv.dateinvoiced, inv.fact_id

staticText.text: Adq. Grav. Dest. a Op. Gravadas
Adq. Grav. Dest. a Op. Grav. y no Grav.
Adq. Grav. Dest. a Op. no Grav.
